content:
Welcome back everyone - I run the S-waiting-on-author and S-waiting-on-review queries here https://forge.rust-lang.org/release/triage-procedure.html

and I don't see anything last updated over 15 days ago, mostly 6 days are the latest. I guess there's nothing to triage at the moment.

Is it possible something happened ~7 days ago that marked them all as updated? I looked at a couple and I don't see anything happening in them 7 days ago despite what the last update time says
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/88646
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92648
Both of these are marked as updated 7 days ago, for example
Yeah, maybe there was a glitch in GitHub?

I looked at those 2 PRs I mentioned with the github API and their update date seems to be 2022-01-10T19:48:17Z and 2022-01-10T19:48:21Z
If you look at all open PRs without the triage waiting-on-review filters sorted by updated-asc you'll notice the first ones are also updated 7 days ago https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pulls?q=is%3Apr+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-asc
Not sure if a bug or something happened to mark them all
I don't see any events 7 days ago in the PRs though
Looks like all PRs have been updated with 8 days.
right... I guess just take a few pages or time box triage work to an hour or two.
That's very strange... the graph shows tons of PRs suddenly being updated in the past week on 2022-01-15, like we saw. There really must have been a glitch with GitHub.
